commit message: can't use toURL() as url isn't absolute. refactored splitquery to just receive the query string.
the one conflicting change after commons cleanup and httpclient removal from commons.
Fixes issue where Torrents would start downloading even if the user had Disconnected in preferences.
Transfer fragment menu adapters now take into consideration wether or not Bittorrent is disconnected.
Don't bother pausing torrents when starting an non-torrent download if user has disconnected bittorrent.
Should fix crash 'java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to pause activity.. java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Receiver not registered', no broadcast receiver was registered on create.
should fix crash when starting transfer - java.lang.IllegalStateException: Can not perform this action after onSaveInstanceState

fixes ConcurrentModificationException on transfer manager. We have way too many traversal operations going on, and those lists aren't that big so it shouldn't be a big issue with memory using CopyOnWriteArrayList containers instead of LinkedLists.
